title: Modified AirTags with disabled anti-stalking speakers are a thing now, because of course
content:
We’ve already established that AirTags are a privacy nightmareÂ — bound to be misused. In the latest horror story of our increasingly creepy world, these trackers are being sold with reduced anti-stalking measures. That’s right, modified AirTags with disabled speakers are being sold on Etsy and eBay (possibly on other platforms as well) for more than

The post Modified AirTags with disabled anti-stalking speakers are a thing now, because of course appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Modified AirTags with disabled anti-stalking speakers are now being sold on Etsy and eBay, making it easier to stalk other people.
